DataElement.preferredName: Abstract Chromosome Segment Chromosome Number java.lang.String
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A concept or idea not associated with any specific instance.:One of the bodies in the cell nucleus that is the bearer of genes, has the form of a delicate chromatin filament during interphase, contracts to form a compact cylinder segmented into two arms by the centromere during metaphase and anaphase stages of cell division, and is capable of reproducing its physical and chemical structure through successive cell divisions.:One of the parts into which something naturally divides._One of the bodies in the cell nucleus that is the bearer of genes, has the form of a delicate chromatin filament during interphase, contracts to form a compact cylinder segmented into two arms by the centromere during metaphase and anaphase stages of cell division, and is capable of reproducing its physical and chemical structure through successive cell divisions.:A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification._Generic value domain for a java datatype that is a class that represents character strings.

Concepts.definition: A concept or idea not associated with any specific instance.
A structure found in cells that is comprised of a strand of linearized double-stranded DNA plus proteins that package the DNA in a condensed coil form and regulate chromosomal function.
One of the parts into which something naturally divides.
